content: अभिवृध् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To grow, increase, be augmented; हविषा कृष्णवर्त्मेव भूय एवाभिवर्धते <ls>Ms. 2. 94.</ls> {@--2@} To thrive, prosper (of men also); दातारो नोऽभिवर्धंतां वेदाः संततिरेव च <ls>Ms. 3. 259</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">7. 27</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 245.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To increase, augment, add to; कोशं, धर्मं, प्रीतिं &c. {@--2@} To stretch, extend, lengthen. {@--3@} To bring up, rear.
